config.title: Tado Hijack Configuration
config.description: Choose the data update intervals and throttle settings.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to check Home/Away and HVAC state. Set to 0 to disable periodic polling (manual only). 3600s (1h) is recommended.
data_description.slow_poll_interval: How often to check batteries and device info. 24h is highly recommended.
data_description.offset_poll_interval: How often to fetch temperature offsets. Costs 1 API call PER VALVE. Set to 0 to disable (manual poll only).
data_description.throttle_threshold: Skip confirmation API calls when remaining quota drops below this value. Set to 0 to disable throttling.
data_description.disable_polling_when_throttled: Stop periodic polling entirely when in throttled mode.

data_description.scan_interval: Interval for presence and heating state. Set to 0 to disable periodic polling.
data_description.slow_poll_interval: Interval for battery and metadata. 24h is sufficient.
data_description.offset_poll_interval: Interval for temperature offsets. Costs 1 API call PER VALVE. 0 = disabled.
data_description.throttle_threshold: Skip confirmation API calls when remaining quota drops below this value. 0 = disabled.

manual_poll.name: Manual Poll
manual_poll.description: Force an immediate update from the Tado API.

resume_all_schedules.name: Resume All Schedules
resume_all_schedules.description: Remove all manual overlays in all zones and return to Smart Schedule.
